He was South Koreas first National Defense Minister, first Prime Minister, eighth home minister, and Ambassador Embassy of Taiwan. == References == * http://100.naver.com/100.nhn?docid=126195 == Other websites == * Cheulgi Memorial Site Category:1900 births Category:1972 deaths Category:People of the Korean War Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea
